Class Field

          Field
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class Field
extends java.awt.Canvas

Field - A Canvas that also manages a game.

Version:
0.5a
Author:
Yama H

Overrides:
paint in class java.awt.Canvas

reportAttack

public boolean reportAttack(Character src,
                            java.util.Set<Pixel> pixels,
                            Coord initPos,
                            boolean longatk)
Report an attack to the field.

Parameters:
src - Character attacking
pixels - pixels of attack sprite
initPos - coordinates where attack is taking place (top right corner)
longatk - true if the attack is a long range attack
Returns:
true if the attack hit someone

addCharacter

public Character addCharacter(java.lang.String charType,
                              Coord init)
Adds a Character to the Field. Null if charType is invalid or if the field is currently full.

Parameters:
charType - a string representation of the type of Character to be made
init - initial coordinate of the new Character
Returns:
a handle to the Character.

removeCharacter

public void removeCharacter(int ucid)
Removes a Character from the Field.

Parameters:
ucid - UCID of the Character being removed
